==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
The older form of {{lang|zh|年}}, {{zh-l|*秊}}, is a combination of {{zh-l|*禾}}, which means ''[[grain]]'' or ''[[rice]]'', and the phonetic element {{zh-l|千}} (which, before it was realised to be a phonetic, was taken to indicate ''[[extension]]''). The meaning ''[[harvest]]'' is original.

|mn_note=nî - vernacular, liân - literary

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[year]] {{lb|zh|in generic contexts}}
# [[harvest]]
# [[annual]]
# [[age]]
# [[period]] of [[life]]
# [[period]] (in history)
# [[New Year]]
# [[thing]]s for the New Year
# {{n-g|Classifier for years.}}
# {{surname|lang=zh}}

====Usage note====
Although 年 is the generic term for ''year'', years of age are typically expressed in {{zh-l|歲}}, a separate system based on the [[duodecennial]] orbital period of Jupiter. Ages in {{zh-l|歲}} are traditionally reckoned using the Chinese lunar calendar, beginning with 1 at the moment of birth and increasing not during birthdays but at the [[Chinese New Year]].

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ねん}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ねん}} {{m|zh|年|tr=nen||year}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''nián'', {{etyl|hak|-}} ''nyên'', {{etyl|yue|-}} ''nin<sup>4</sup>''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|ねん|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Counter====
{{ja-pos|ねん|counter}}

# [[year]]s

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ねん}}

# a [[year]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''年'''に一度|'''ねん''' に いちど|once a '''year'''}}

====Suffix====
{{ja-pos|ねん|suffix}}

# a [[grade]], a school year
#: {{ja-usex|彼は中学２'''年'''だ。|^かれ は ちゅうがく に-'''ねん''' だ。|He's in the second '''grade''' in junior high school.}}
# a [[year]]
#: {{ja-usex|２００８'''年'''に橋を建設し始めるようだ。|^に せん はち-'''ねん''' に はし を けんせつ しはじめる よう だ。|They seem to be going to start constructing the bridge in (the '''year''') 2008.}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|とし}}
{{IPAchar|/to<sub>2</sub>si/}} → {{IPAchar|/tosi/}} → {{IPAchar|/toɕi/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=とし}}. Originally referred to [[grain]], particularly [[rice]], and by extension, the year's [[harvest]].<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|とし|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|歳}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|とし}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=とし|obsolete}} [[grain]], particularly [[rice]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=とし|obsolete}} a grain [[harvest]], a grain [[crop]]
# a [[year]]
# [[age]]

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|年神|^としがみ}}: the [[spirit]] or [[god]] of the [[year]]
* {{ja-r|年を取る|とし を とる}}: to [[pass]] [[New Years]]; to [[age]]

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|とせ}}
{{IPAchar|/to<sub>2</sub>se/}} → {{IPAchar|/tose/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=とし}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Likely a shift in pronunciation from ''toshi''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|とせ}}

====Suffix====
{{ja-pos|とせ|suffix}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=とせ|obsolete}} {{non-gloss definition|used to count years}}
#* {{RQ:Manyoshu|5|880}}, text [http://jti.lib.virginia.edu/japanese/manyoshu/Man5Yos.html#880|here]:
#*: {{ja-usex|阿麻社迦留、比奈尓伊都'''等世'''、周麻比都都、美夜故能提夫利、和周良延尓家利|^あまざかる、 ひな に いつ '''とせ'''、 すまひつつ、 みやこ の てぶり、 わすらえにけり|While living five ''years''' in the far-remote countryside, I wound up forgetting the manners of the capital}}
